content: Ugh, this is a really great system, but it is still so hard for me. I used to write 400 words a day, in a manner you described, but after about a month I had a block. It is almost 2 months now and I can’t force myself to write. Of course I write something — I publish blog post from time to time, or few articles here and there. But my goal is to write a book (fiction) and those 400 words were dedicated to only that. But day after day I focus on smaller things like blog, articles or anything else, and I just can’t force myself to write this book. Even though I really want to and have the general idea of how it should look. Anyway — thanks for this, it motivates me to try again!
